item.title: Hubris Is Undoing Trump’s Second Term
item.description: Trump has overestimated what he could achieve and underestimated the voters, allies, and legal grounding needed to make his accomplishments last.

item.title: Gavin Newsom Is Fooling No One
item.description: The California governor can hardly pretend to be a champion of free speech, gun rights, and life.

item.title: Mayors warn that Trump's hardline immigration tactics could dent trust in law enforcement

item.title: This California Case Shows How Blue States Refuse To Vet Fraudsters Before Gifting Them Millions
item.description: Blue states are pouring out cash with a system of pretend-rules that don't matter. They're running free money programs with no lock on the front door.

item.title: Democrats Want To Keep Illegals In America To Rig The Census And Congressional Apportionment
item.description: Democrats have recognized that their very survival as a national political party rests upon importing millions of foreigners into the United States.

item.title: Ladies, It’s Your Christian Duty To Resist Moral Blackmail About ICE On Instagram
item.description: You are allowed to resist the pressure campaign and recognize it for what it is: emotion-driven self-righteousness.
